sql.select_sql: SELECT CODE, RuleValidTime, STDT, WarnGradeID, Threshold, WarnTypeID FROM WarnRule_B_Other where WarnTypeID = :f1<int>;
sql.update_sql: update WarnRule_B_Other set WarnTypeID = :f1<int> where WarnTypeID = :f2<int>;
sql.inster_sql: insert into WarnRule_B_Other (CODE, RuleValidTime, STDT, WarnGradeID, Threshold, WarnTypeID) values (:f1<char[32]>, :f2<timestamp>, :f3<int>, :f4<int>, :f5<float>, :f6<int>);
